website_summaries.verdict: The King of Iron Fist tournament returns in Tekken Tag Tournament 2, a well-executed and punishing fighter.
pros: Challenging and deep combat systemStable online play with replay supportFight Lab does a good job of covering the basicsCustomizable soundtrack is a fun addition
cons: Tutorials do not prepare you to process individual characters

customer_reviews.title: Best fighter lineup of the entire series
customer_reviews.text: Best fighter lineup of the entire series. Granted a lot of characters are the "twin" versions of core characters (like Baek and Hwoarang), but they are different enough that it pisses me off that they aren't included in Tekken 7. In my opinion, put Tekken 7's rage meter near death thing into TTT2 and re-release it for PS4 and I will buy that s***. I wish I had more friends that loved Tekken to play this game with me. I played TTT1 back in the day like a fiend. This did not disappoint; only my friends' skill level and dedication did.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Clearly for hardcore gamers -- no offense to those out there...
customer_reviews.text: Game plays perfectly, and is a strong addition to the Tekken franchise. But even with that in its favor, the game itself is overrated. It discourages true co-op play, as only one or two modes feature the option to play with a partner. Tag team "dream match" games are meant to be fun, not frustrating. As a casual gamer, this game is something I'd only pick up if (A) I was really bored and felt like playing to get all 60+ characters' endings, and (B) I didn't have to work all week, every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tag Ever
customer_reviews.text: I had not played Tekken in a good long while and I forgot how much fun it was. I played this for days on end. Getting points and unlocking costume to customize my character. All modes are super fun. The only beef I have is the online mode, which is SUPER laggy. If you play Tekken you know timing is everything and lag will mess you up BAD. I prefer playing with friends over at the house or just playing offline. Super fun game indeed I greatly enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dalya84

customer_reviews.title: Best Tekken ever so far!
customer_reviews.text: With a cast of 44 fighters (not counting the free DLC characters), Tekken Tag Tournament 2's roster is immense. And it is not uncommon for fighters to have more than 100 moves at their disposal!! Tekken may host the King of Iron Fist Tournament, but finding victory requires more than a heavy hand. Knowledge of your opponent's arsenal, precise execution, and quick reflexes get you further than simply knowing the strongest attacks. Like its predecessor, Tekken Tag Tournament 2 takes the 3D combat mechanics of the Tekken series and doubles the number of combatants, allowing for more complex and dynamic matches.
customer_reviews.author: ErgoProxy

customer_reviews.title: Really Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game. I love fighting games and grew up on them now i mostly played Street Fighter and King Of Fighters. When I saw it i decided to give it a try and I was definitely not disappointed. Great characters and love the tag team aspect of it. Great add to my collection and also a good game when playing with friends or family when they are over. Also has online if you're into the competitve scene. Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jhovany antunez

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Took longer to arrive than the others I ordered at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rutter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game for fans of the fights. SAGA Teken
customer_reviews.text: This product meets all expectations that I needed. I like the state as arrival at their destination. Brand new. I recommend this game for its excellent story, graphics, sound and content of violence, excellent number of fighters. The movement of the fighters in the ring and different combos are excellent. You should definitely play it. RATING 100 points.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have Tekken 6 and was debating if I should get TTT 2. Based on the reviews I decided to give it a try. Haven't played Tekken 6 ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Teodora

customer_reviews.title: U got to be crazy not to have this
customer_reviews.text: Hey, if you're a tekken fan, or even just a little, you should get this. Some stages are a reminder of the first installment (TTT for PS2), even close up graphics are great, the fighting sequence just as good or even better than the first. I've heard some complain about the difficulty, if you've played TTT for the PS2, u should find last stage and gameplay overall to be a breeze, even on medium difficulty. So wat r u still doing reading this review, go get this game
customer_reviews.author: D. Sebro

customer_reviews.title: Rekindling Old Memories
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Tekken. After my Dad got Tekken 2 for me back in 1997 I became hooked to this franchise. Lili and Zafrina are two of my favorites but I was thrilled when I reunited myself with my #1 fighter Jun Kazama.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D. Little

customer_reviews.title: One of the best fighting games to date
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Tekken game for playing against others. It's balanced, the characters are varied, and the levels are elaborate. It can get a little boring playing one player, but if you have a few others to play with it's one of the best fighting games to date.
customer_reviews.author: Obo the Dodo

customer_reviews.title: This is Tekken Tag Tournament 2!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent copy of Tekken Tag Tournament 2, I love it! There is no comparison with the first Tekken Tag Tournament, this one is way better!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Galactus

customer_reviews.title: Best Tekken Yet!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed when I played Tekken 6. Sure the graphics has improved from the last but somehow it was lacking and I lost interested. But when Tekken Tag 2 arrived and played it, I was surprised how fun it was. More characters, more options and so forth. I really enjoyed this Tekken and I hope this will keep up for Tekken 7 due that Tekken Tag 2 is non-cannon while Tekken 7 is cannon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Nearly complete Tekken!
customer_reviews.text: Got the game cheap Black Saturday for $25 only a month or so after it came out. What a great deal! Even without pre-ordering, I was still able to get the bikinis and extra characters free via DLC. So many characters, modes, customizations, and accessories. It's about time Capcom came out without another Tekken Tag. the graphics and gameplay are great. It's a good game to introduce friends who are new to Tekken.
customer_reviews.author: Kieffer

customer_reviews.title: Tekken and history
customer_reviews.text: First of all that game have history with alot o people and fun that intrest in arcade and consoles for me it is from tekken 3 on ps1. Second it is very fun to play offline and online or friends and family that all. Thanks for your reading it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Isa Almahmeed

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: I chose to give this five stars because it was shipped in on time, and it's a great game that my husband loves! There are plenty of characters to choose from in the game, the story line can be a little odd at times, but over all. the fighting moves and the characters look excellent. My husband stayed up playing this game all night, so I give it five stars! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Its AWSUM!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this game! It's very fun! U will definitely enjoy it if u buy it! So many players, so many new skills. Fans of Tekken will find it very seducing that you can have all the "movies" in "gallery" from previous tekken games! (unfortunately its not free, but anyways, its good if u are a dedicated collector!). For those that are interested whether ppl play it online - yes they do! Lots of ppl play it online, you just have to wait couple of minutes before online fights start :)
customer_reviews.author: Justeen

customer_reviews.title: Best Fighter Game Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Tekken game out on the market. Not only does it have a huge selection of characters but it also the graphic are smooth and effortless. The customization is also almost endless with all the different combinations available to you. Overall the best game I've bought in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Love it but you have to like Tekken
customer_reviews.text: I don't think they really added anything to this game but it looks nice and plays nice. This is a hardcore fighting game with a steep learning curve but if you like that your love this game. If you already like Tekken this is just more of a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: ArchieZer0

customer_reviews.title: Only serious Tekken fans need apply
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing Tekken since Tekken 1 on the PS1 and let me tell you this game is by far the best Tekken ever made, the game play is killer. The graphics are top notch this game is so addicting, its just really fun to play over and over again. The environments are more interactive especially when you get hit into something in the environment and you come crashing down. I will always order from amazon I couldn't find it at any gamestop, and it came in like 3 days. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Rocking gameplay. Could do with better graphics
customer_reviews.text: Needs better graphics. But otherwise - rocking release. Good characters. Love the arcade play. For those who love fighting games, this is a must. I grew up on playing arcade games and this has been my favorite ever since
customer_reviews.author: Goodsound

customer_reviews.title: The best tekken yet.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a fan of tekken or any fighting game, this is the game to purchase. Includes every tekken character ever conceived and the online multiplayer experience is awesome. I love the small things they allow you to do such as putting your own music for the stages. This is the best tekken ever.
customer_reviews.author: plimple

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tekken fans
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big tekken fan and this is probably the most complete experience yet. Lots of game play options, ultra smooth and tight controls, plenty of characters to choose from. My only beef is with character customization, which seems to be much more generic than past games, but it's a minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game..
customer_reviews.text: I love tekken series.. I have Mortal Kombat 9 too but tekken has always been a better game in 3D engine, playability, fight system, animation, etc.. Just see a throw and you'll understand what I mean.. The tag system is complex but very impressive.. This game need a lot of time to learn because every character have tons of moves. ** Edit ** I only rate this game with 4 stars is because of some stupid stages (Japanese culture influence)
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best tag team game out there.
customer_reviews.text: Tekken is the best way to play tag team. I've always enjoyed the series since it first came out but this is the ultimate version. It is also great for the beginner. The training mode is really helpful for the new tekken player. Ive always loved the quirky nature of the series and this was a great addition. Every character and lots of customizing. Tekken tag 2 is the definition of a great 3d fighting game. Its a must buy if you enjoy the genre.
customer_reviews.author: radias light

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: After playing playing the waiting game with Tekken Revolution I bought this instead. It's a much harder game, but very happy that there are no invincible frame moves in it
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best Tekken.
customer_reviews.text: There are a whole lot of characters, game modes, and the option to play single or tag matches is very convenient. Awesome game. Online rocks too. You can train while waiting for opponents to fight. Its right. If you love the Tekken series, this is the best Tekken so far. You can even download via DLC soundtracks and movies from other Tekken games.

customer_reviews.text: AWESOME 3D game! So much fun and tons of characters! We have a 75" Samsung 4K 3D tv and this game will blow your mind! Hours of entertainment!

customer_reviews.title: My favorite game
customer_reviews.text: Been playing tekken for 4 years my favorite game so far. Didn't come in scratched. Literally my favorite game of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: A Deep Fighting Game FINALLY Gets Updated with Good Replay Mode
customer_reviews.text: While this replay mode is still lagging behind that of Street Fighter, the game finally has enough replay theater functionality to really let you see a wide range of fighting and learn from it. This is the best version of Tekken to date because of the learning options available. Those interested enough can see what pros do and fully study how their techniques are different from yours. One interesting feature is the ability to set a 'lag simulation' when in practice mode, so you can get used to having a slight button input delay just like when you're fighting online. Quite helpful in practicing!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Z

customer_reviews.title: excellent game

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: Lots and lots of characters, which is awesome. Tekken Tag is my all-time favorite fighting game and I guess I feel this doesn't improve that much on it. It's basically the same thing with more characters. I think I am bummed because Tekken 6 had really good customization options (I made Nina look like Power Girl) and this version's custom options aren't that great. And the play is so similar... why not have, say, triple tage like Marvel Vs. Capcom? But... still highly recommended, will provide many hours of fun.

customer_reviews.title: Best tekken yet
customer_reviews.text: I've been a huge tekken fan since the first one came out years ago. The game mechanics are very similar to tekken 6 making it easier to pick up. However this is not a fighting game for new incoming tekken players unless you plan to invest time actually learning the different characters and the overall game mechanics. . Visuals are amazing and stages are breakable making for interesting ways to combo your opponent. Definitely worth picking up.

I recommend any fan of fighting games pick this one up.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough I suppose...
customer_reviews.text: I have every Tekken title you can think of and every one of them having little to no problems at all. Tekken 6 being the most major of them all. This game is still young and the first Tekken to have downloadable content to update the game. ONLY 2 cons. with this one, the DLC characters are taking too long to release, and playing co-op (which is not against each other) you can only do the arcade mode. The first TTT you can do just about any mode co-op. This is easily the best Tekken with ranking system though and everything else is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Titus Horner

customer_reviews.title: For hardcore fighting game enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: This game provides an intense challenge for those who wish to claim the, title "king of iron fist." But in sort this game is extremely difficult but then rewarding to those that put in the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Going over 10 years and Tekken is still entertaining, fun, and everything you want it to be
customer_reviews.text: Been playing Tekken since Tekken 1. The Tekken tradition of being one of the best fighting game series' ever (if not THE best) continues.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Striker

customer_reviews.title: Game arrived in time and in perfect condition, plus the game itself is so awesome
customer_reviews.text: Game arrived in time and in perfect condition, plus the game itself is so awesome! Definitely recommended for every lover of fighting games in general
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Warzawczyk

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I want start by saying its a great game definately worth my money and on top of that the game came sooner than I thought so it work out all the way around Very Pleased :)
customer_reviews.author: wesley mccombs

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of the Tekken franchise and I gotta say that this is the best game yet! It has all the characters and bunch of songs!
customer_reviews.author: Andres I.

customer_reviews.title: Action-adventure game
customer_reviews.text: My grandson said it is fun to play once you learn the game. It was not hard to learn. He would recommend it to anyone 12 years and up. It is a fighting game so if you do not want your child to play this type of game then my grandson would not recommend it. My grandson is 14 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great game, very fun and entertaining, plenty to unlock. I highly recommend buying.Tekken fans should add this game to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kaien

customer_reviews.title: Problem with promotional code #1
customer_reviews.text: Problem with promotional code #1 Problem with promotional code #1 , when enter the first promocional , display code invalid , please i need help. William Moreno
customer_reviews.author: William J. Moreno Osorio

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: if you enjoyed all the other versions of tekken then you will like this, its a tag team battle with the character you know and love. i recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Velisa V. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Tekken Tag Tournament 2
customer_reviews.text: I played this game for 5 hours straight yesterday, The game is awesome & obviously very addicting lol... Been a fan since the very 1st Tekken! I must say although Tekken 6 was pretty fun, TTT2 is a big step up! The new tag combos are Siiiiick!!! They take alot of thinking & some time to get used to, but it gets easier once you figure out how to master them! Overall great fun, awesome graphics & gameplay! If your a Tekken fan, this game is a definite buy!
customer_reviews.author: P. Simental

product_meta.title: Tekken Tag Tournament 2 PS3
product_meta.description:
We are Tekken: Never underestimate the heart of a champion. The original tag team fighter that started it all is back. Tekken Tag Tournament 2 delivers new and returning characters in the largest roster ever. Experience the most advanced attack mechanics, ultimate combo move sets and new battle modes. With innovative features to broaden tekken consumer accessibility, unlimited fighter combinations & multiple ways to challenge your friends – get ready for the next battle!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER





FROM THE MANUFACTURER






Pair Play
Click here for a larger image

 WE ARE TEKKEN
Never underestimate the heart of a champion. The original Tag Team Fighter that started it all is back. Tekken Tag Tournament 2 delivers new and returning characters in the largest roster ever. Experience the most advanced attack mechanics. Ultimate combo move sets and new battle modes with innovative features to broaden Tekken consumer accessibility. Unlimited fighter combinations and multiple ways to challenge your friends - get ready for the next battle!

Winner of Machinima – Best Fighting Game

 KEY GAME FEATURES 
 * Multiplayer Match – Challenge your friends in a 2-on-2 tag-team battle, 1-on-1 or 1-on-2
 * Pair Play – Up to 4 players can each control a character in the ultimate team battle
 * Fight Lab – All new mode to customize combot's appearance & for the first time ever, his moves
 * Largest Playable Roster – More than 50 characters to choose from
 * New Stages – Fight in your favorite countries around the world
 * Enviromental FX – Clothing condition alters in real-time with water & dirt effects
 * New Moves – Each character expands their fight arsenal with explosive new tag-throws & tag-combos
 * Online Features – All-new features bring the community together like never before
 * Offline Battle Modes – Re-live the classic arcade mode, train in a first-class practice mode, customize your Team/Character appearance & much more





ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS:
feature_bullets: Multiplayer Match: Challenge your friends in a 2-on-2 tag-team battle, 1-on-1 or 1-on-2
Pair Play: Up to 4 players can each control a character in the ultimate team battle
Fight Lab: All new mode to customize combot's appearance & for the first time ever, his moves
Largest playable roster: More than 50 characters to choose from
New stages: Fight in your favorite countries around the world
